div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: "The Yorktown Central School District is a very special place with some of the most talented people who work tirelessly to support our amazing students. We are all profoundly committed to your children, and our team will work relentlessly to ensure that our students receive the very best in every aspect of their education."

ul.li: The deadline for transportation requests has been temporarily extended. Please contact the transportation office for additional information

p.strong: It is the goal of the Yorktown Central School District that the information on our website is accessible to individuals with visual, hearing or cognitive disabilities. Efforts have been made to ensure that our website complies with New York State standards on website accessibility. If you are unable to access any media or page on our website please email aburns@yorktown.org with detailed information on the location of the page or media you were attempting to access.
